name: Common Validations Feature
description:
As a user
  I want to perform Trade Validations
  So that I acheive a business goal

children.name: Verify the Validate endpoint for Valid Data
Given User has valid data to post for happy flow
When User posts the json request
Then Verify the response is valid
Verify error message when value date is before trade date
Given User has Value Date older than Trade Date in input
When User posts the json request
Then Verify the response contains the 'cannot be null and it has to be after trade date' error message
Verify error message when when value date is on weekend
Given User has the Value Date on weekend in input
When User posts the json request
Then Verify the response contains the 'cannot fall on Saturday/Sunday' error message
Verify error message when Invalid Customer is provided
Given User has Invalid counterparty/customer in input
When User posts the json request
Then Verify the response contains the 'is not supported. Supported counterparties: [[PLUTO2, PLUTO1]]' error message
Verify error message when Invalid Legal Entity is provided. Requirement: It should accept only CS Zurich as LE. Defect: It is accepting any string as Legal Entity
Given User has Invalid Legal entity in input
When User posts the json request
Then Verify the response contains the 'is not supported. Supported Legal entity: [CS Zurich]' error message

stackTrace.methodName: Verify the response contains the 'is not supported. Supported Legal entity: [CS Zurich]' error message

exception.stackTrace:
org.junit.ComparisonFailure: expected:<[ERROR]> but was:<[SUCCESS]>
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:115)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:144)
	at com.qe.vt.steps.ValidationsSteps.aResponseContainsTheRequiredErrorMessage(ValidationsSteps.java:49)
	at ✽.Verify the response contains the 'is not supported. Supported Legal entity: [CS Zurich]' error message(classpath:features/CommonValidations.feature:29)
exception.name: org.junit.ComparisonFailure

stackTrace.methodName: Verify the response contains the 'is not supported. Supported Legal entity: [CS Zurich]' error message

exceptions.stackTrace:
org.junit.ComparisonFailure: expected:<[ERROR]> but was:<[SUCCESS]>
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:115)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:144)
	at com.qe.vt.steps.ValidationsSteps.aResponseContainsTheRequiredErrorMessage(ValidationsSteps.java:49)
	at ✽.Verify the response contains the 'is not supported. Supported Legal entity: [CS Zurich]' error message(classpath:features/CommonValidations.feature:29)
exceptions.name: org.junit.ComparisonFailure
